Articles.Content: What, and when will be the last KSP release?

KSP Ride, a mobile game released in April 2025 to middling reception by Take Two. KSP Ride is a management sim in which players collect unique and powerful rocket parts by participating in community events and spending the "Funds" in game currency. The game received criticism upon release from many industry outlets such as IGN which noted that the game had strayed "far from the initial premise of Kerbal Space Program". Despite this, KSP Ride went on to become Take Two's fifth best preforming property for the year and is considered the predecessor of GTA Ride.

Metascore: 74   userscore: 58

15 hours ago, strider3 said:

What, and when will be the last KSP release?

1.123 is probably the last. Maybe one or two bugfix releases. Maybe.
